---

## Scenario
Describe when or where the performance issue happens (e.g., scrolling a list, animation lag, app startup delay).

## Baseline metrics
What was observed? (FPS drops, jank, memory spikes, slow rebuilds, etc.)

## Expected performance
What should the target or acceptable performance be?

## Steps to reproduce
1. Run the app
2. Perform '...'
3. Observe slowdown or UI lag

## Profiling / traces
Attach profiler outputs (Flutter DevTools performance trace, `flutter run --profile`, screenshots).

## Hypothesis / plan
What might be causing the issue? Any proposed fixes or next steps?
